home.title: Home
home.homeJoinUsTitleCaption:
trusted pulsa provider with competitive prices,
ready to be your service
home.homeOurProfileFirstParagraph: Established in September 2020, the Company brings expertise, experiences, networks and strong financial capability in the industry.
home.homeOurProfileSecondParagraph: The Company has its core business activities in commercializing web-portal and digital platform. It is also optimized with our ability to deliver an integrated solution to accommodate the customers needs.
home.homeOurProfileThirdParagraph: With a combined strong technical – commercial – operations abilities, the Company is able to deliver the best output for customers’ satisfaction.

about.title: About Merdeka Pulsa
about.aboutMerdekaFirstParagraph: Merdeka Pulsa provides digital products for independent lifestyle. We help you to surf on the internet, communicate, purchase PLN token, pay for PDAM and credit card bills, even purchase game vouchers in the most convenient way.
about.aboutMerdekaSecondParagraph: We provide convenient and secured service, start from registration, transaction and after-sales service; we are with you all the time.

place.title: Located in South Jakarta
place.content: Our office is in strategic business center in South Jakarta.

trustWorthyCompany.title: Registered Company
trustWorthyCompany.content: Merdeka Pulsa is established under Indonesia Law and therefore has complete legal documentations.

depositCompany.title: Deposit to Company's Bank Account
depositCompany.content: Your deposit is safe; it is not kept under Personal / Individual bank account.

freeRegistration.title: Free & Convenient Registration
freeRegistration.content: We guarantee no registration fee required. Once registration is completed, activate your account by transfering the deposit, and you can start transacting all our products.

competitivePrice.title: Competitive Price
competitivePrice.content: We offer you a competitive price in the market.

smallDeposit.title: Small Deposit, only Rp50,000
smallDeposit.content: Only with deposit amount of Rp50,000, you can directly transact in our platform with no additional charge.

depositTime.title: Deposit Anytime, from 8AM - 8PM
depositTime.content: We open the deposit service with no day-off, available from 8AM until 8PM WIB. Our Helpdesk will gladly assist you.

everytimeTransaction.title: 24 Hours Transactions
everytimeTransaction.content: Our system supports 24-hours transaction for all products. Get maximum benefits for your business!

optionalBanks.title: Available in 3 bank options
optionalBanks.content: Deposit in Merdeka Pulsa is supported by 3 reputable banks in  Indonesia, e.g. Bank Central Asia (BCA), Bank Negara Indonesia (BNI) and Bank Mandiri. Keep your transfer slip of deposit payment!

completeDocumentation.title: Complete Documentation
completeDocumentation.content: We provide complete documentations, including a sandbox for your testing & development environment.

easyMonitoring.title: Web-Access Monitoring
easyMonitoring.content: Reliable Web-Acess to monitor your transactions, deposit movements, daily analysis, history of past transactions, report download feature. You can monitor your business anytime anywhere, real-time.

registration.title: Registration

placeholders.title: Fill-in the form below to join Merdeka Pulsa

registration.modalAfterRegistration: Thanks for your registration at Merdeka Pulsa. Our team will contact you for verification in 1 x 24 hours.
registration.registrationInformation: For more information, please reach us at 021-2951 7763 or Telegram at @merdekacs

deposit.title: Deposit
deposit.banks: Merdeka Pulsa receives your deposit through 3 bank options : Mandiri, BCA, and BNI
deposit.notes: Keep your transfer slip, contact our Telegram

contactUs.title: Contact Us
contactUs.address: Sarana Building 5th Floor Jl. Mampang Prapatan No. 26 Duren Tiga, Pancoran, Jakarta Selatan 12760
contactUs.kontakModalPopUp: Thank you for your question. Our team will answer your question in 1X24 Hours

purpose.title: Our Objectives
purpose.firstParagraph: The Company aims to become trustworthy partner in every business deal; and puts our customer experience as highest priority.
purpose.secondParagraph: We collaborate, hand – in – hand, with large community to create sustainable environment, accelerating the implementation of digital initiatives.

integrity.title: Integrity
integrity.value: Our integrity comes first in doing business

positive.title: Positive Attitude
positive.value: We spread positive vibes in our environment

creative.title: Creative and Open Mind
creative.value: Find creative ways in doing the work; and open our mind for any possibilities

commit.title: Commitment
commit.value: We are committed to deliver the best result

care.title: Customer Focus
care.value: We seek customer’s satisfaction and feedbacks

trustWorthy.title: Trustworthy
trustWorthy.value: Be trustworthy individual for the surroundings
